casebody.data:
Shirlee R. Glassman, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Eli Glassman, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 53689;Jerome Berkson, of Chicago, for appellant.Rinella & Rinella, and Bernard Kaufman, both of Chicago, (Owen L. Doss and Bernard Kaufman, of counsel,) for appellee.

Relrearing denied July 15, 1971.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE JONES.
